content: standujar: This week, standujar drove significant architectural improvements across the Eliza ecosystem, landing a massive fix in the core repository (elizaos/eliza#6024, +15k lines) to correctly register a key provider. They also introduced a new `mentionContext` interface (elizaos/eliza#6030) and refactored the Discord plugin to adopt it (elizaos-plugins/plugin-discord#19). This work demonstrates a strong focus on refactoring and bug fixes across core application code and tests.
